responses: Welcome to Brew Haven! How can I assist you today?
Hello! Ready to find your perfect brew?
Hey there! How’s it going? Looking for a coffee recommendation?
Hi! What brings you to Brew Haven today?
Thanks for stopping by Brew Haven! See you soon!
Goodbye! Remember, there’s always a coffee waiting for you here!
Take care! Come back for more coffee inspiration anytime!
Bye for now! Stay caffeinated!

patterns: Couldn't have done it without you
responses: You’re welcome! Enjoy your coffee!
Glad to be of service! Any time!
Happy to help! Swing by if you have more questions.
No problem! Wishing you a delightful coffee experience!

patterns: Do you have a sweet coffee?
What’s a good coffee for beginners?
I like dark roast, any suggestions?
Do you have any seasonal flavors?
responses: If you like it strong, our espresso or dark roast will hit the spot!
For a sweet treat, try our caramel macchiato or vanilla latte!
New to coffee? Start with a classic latte or a mocha for a smooth introduction.
This season, we recommend our pumpkin spice latte and spiced caramel coffee.

patterns: What types of drinks do you have?
Do you have any new items?
Do you have any non-coffee drinks?
Can I see the food menu?
responses: Our menu includes a variety of coffees, teas, smoothies, and pastries. Our bestseller is the caramel macchiato!
You’ll find espresso, cappuccino, lattes, cold brews, and more. We also have sandwiches and desserts!
Non-coffee options include matcha latte, chai tea, and refreshing smoothies.
We just added a lavender latte and maple cold brew for a unique twist!

patterns: How long does it take to prepare my drink?
What’s the status of my order?
I ordered a coffee, when will it be ready?
Is my coffee ready for pickup?
responses: Your order should be ready in 5-10 minutes for pickup.
Currently preparing your order! Hang tight; it’ll be ready shortly.
Check your order status on our app for real-time updates.
Your coffee is being crafted as we speak! We’ll notify you when it’s ready.
We’re open daily from 7 AM to 8 PM. On weekends, we close at 10 PM.
Our hours are weekdays 7 AM - 8 PM, and weekends 8 AM - 10 PM.
We’re open every day except major holidays.
Feel free to visit us any day! Check our website for holiday hours.

patterns: Can I pay with my coffee rewards card?
responses: We accept cash, credit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and coffee rewards cards.
You can pay with cash, cards, and digital wallets like Apple and Google Pay.
Yes, all major payment methods, including our loyalty rewards card, are accepted here.
We’re flexible with payment options. Use what works best for you!

patterns: Tell me about your loyalty program
What are the perks of your loyalty program?
Do you have a rewards program?
Can I redeem points for free coffee?
responses: Our loyalty program gives you points for every purchase. Earn enough points to redeem for free drinks and discounts!
Every purchase earns you points that go towards free drinks, discounts, and exclusive promotions.
Join our loyalty program for rewards on every purchase. Points can be redeemed for free coffee and more!
Sign up for our rewards program and start earning points today!

patterns: What’s the special of the day?
Tell me about your current deals
Do you have any limited-time offers?
responses: Today’s promotion: Buy one latte, get the second 50% off!
Our current deal is 10% off all pastries with any drink purchase.
Happy hour is from 2-4 PM with 15% off all iced drinks!
Check out our app for the latest promotions and seasonal specials.

patterns: I want almond milk instead of regular
Can I make my drink iced?
Can I get a large size?
responses: Absolutely! You can choose milk alternatives, extra shots, and adjust sweetness levels.
We offer almond, soy, and oat milk, as well as sugar-free syrups.
Feel free to customize your order to your liking! Just let us know.
You can choose your preferred milk, flavor, and strength for a personalized drink.

patterns: Where can I find your shop?
Do you have a location map?
responses: Our main shop is located at 123 Brew Street, Coffee Town.
Find us at 456 Espresso Lane, Suite 101.
Visit our store at 789 Caffeine Avenue! We’d love to see you.
We’re located downtown at 101 Mocha Plaza. Stop by anytime!

patterns: Do you know any coffee jokes?
responses: Why did the coffee file a police report? It got mugged!
What’s a coffee’s favorite workout? The French press!
How did the coffee show self-discipline? It stayed grounded.
What did the coffee say to the sugar? You’re sweet enough without me!
